overview: Lorenzo Carilo selects more-or-less menial jobs at which to make a living, other more "select" jobs not paying enough, and then he meets and falls in love with Vivian Forrester the daughter of a new-rich family. What's a poor boy to do? He might pose as a French Duke.
tagline: Leaders of New York Society Completely Taken in by Man They Had Frequently Tipped
title: Society Snobs
